section.title: openedx.core.djangoapps.schedules.management.commands.setup_models_to_send_test_emails module
section.paragraph: A managment command that can be used to set up Schedules with various configurations for testing.

desc_content.paragraph: Bases: BaseCommand
A management command that generates schedule objects for all expected schedule email types, so that it is easy to generate test emails of all available types.
The actual logic of the command. Subclasses must implement this method.

desc_signature.desc_annotation: = 'A management command that generates schedule objects for all expected schedule email types, so that it is easy to\ngenerate test emails of all available types.'
